  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/940</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/940</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Els gira-sols</string>
            <string language="en">The Sunflowers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Sonnenblumen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Tournesols</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os Sunflowers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I Girasoli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ηλίανθοι</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Projecte escolar interdisciplinar sobre el gira-sol. Recull informació i imatges de les activitats realitzades per al conreu de la planta i activitats relacionades de l'àrea de plàstica i de l'àrea de llengua. També recull activitats musicals. 1r premi (infantil i primària) del 7è concurs de webs de ciència.</string>
            <string language="en">Cross-curricular project about sunflowers. Collection of information and images of the activities carried out  in the growing of this plant as well as activities related to Arts and Language. It also contains Music activities. Awarded with the 1st prize in the 7th Contest of Science Websites</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">cartografia</string>
            <string language="en">cartography</string>
            <string language="es">cartografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">jardí</string>
            <string language="en">garden</string>
            <string language="es">jardín</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">jardineria</string>
            <string language="en">gardening</string>
            <string language="es">jardinería</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzlehrplanprojekt über Sonnenblumen. 
Nachrichtenbeschaffung und Bilder der Aktivitäten, die im 
Wachsen dieses Betriebes sowie Aktivitäten durchgeführt wurden, 
stand auf künsten und Sprache in Verbindung. Sie enthält auch 
Musikaktivitäten. Zugesprochen mit dem 1. Preis im 7. 
Wettbewerb von Wissenschaft Web site</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">projet Croix-curriculaire au sujet des 
tournesols. La collecte d'informations et images des activités 
effectuées dans la croissance de cette usine aussi bien que des 
activités a associé aux arts et au langage. Elle contient 
également des activités de musique. Attribué avec le 1er prix
dans le 7ème concours des sites Web de la Science</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">projeto Cruz-cross-curricular sobre sunflowers. 
A coleção de informação e de imagens das atividades 
realizadas no crescimento desta planta as.well.as atividades 
relacionou-se às artes e à língua. Contem também atividades 
da música. Concedido com o 1o prêmio na 7a competição de Web
site da ciência</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">progetto Traversa-d'insegnamento circa i 
girasoli. La raccolta di informazioni e le immagini delle 
attività effettuate nel crescere di questa pianta così come le 
attività si è riferita alle arti ed al linguaggio. Egualmente 
contiene le attività di musica. Assegnato con il primo premio 
nel settimo concorso dei Web site di scienza</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγώνιος-διδακτικό πρόγραμμα για τους ηλίανθους. 
Η συλλογή των πληροφοριών και οι εικόνες των δραστηριοτήτων 
που πραγματοποιούνται στην ανάπτυξη αυτών των εγκαταστάσεων καθώς
επίσης και των δραστηριοτήτων αφορούσαν τις τέχνες και τη γλώσσα.
Περιέχει επίσης τις δραστηριότητες μουσικής. 
Απονεμημένος με το 1$ο βραβείο στον 7ο διαγωνισμό των 
ιστοχώρων επιστήμης</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cartography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Garten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Im Garten arbeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cartographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jardin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jardinage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cartography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jardim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jardinar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cartografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">giardino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">giardinaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρτογραφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κήπος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κηπουρική</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
